oneOf.description: A class representing a file in the inference.sh ecosystem.
oneOf.title: File

path.description: URL or the path to the LoRA weights (.safetensors). Supports HuggingFace repos, Civitai URLs, or direct URLs.
path.title: Path

scale.description: The scale of the LoRA weight. This is used to scale the LoRA weight before merging it with the base model.
scale.title: Scale

description: Input schema for FLUX.1 [dev] LoRA image generation.

prompt.description: The prompt to generate an image from.
examples: Extreme close-up of a single tiger eye, direct frontal view. Detailed iris and pupil. Sharp focus on eye texture and color.
prompt.title: Prompt

height.description: The height in pixels of the generated image.
height.title: Height

width.description: The width in pixels of the generated image.
width.title: Width

image.description: Optional input image for image-to-image mode. When provided, the model will transform this image based on the prompt.

strength.description: How much to transform the input image (image-to-image only). 1.0 = full remake, 0.0 = preserve original.
strength.title: Strength

loras.description: The LoRAs to use for the image generation. You can use any number of LoRAs and they will be merged together to generate the final image.
loras.title: Loras

num_inference_steps.description: The number of inference steps to perform.
num_inference_steps.title: Num Inference Steps

guidance_scale.description: The CFG (Classifier Free Guidance) scale is a measure of how close you want the model to stick to your prompt when looking for a related image to show you.
guidance_scale.title: Guidance Scale

seed.description: The same seed and the same prompt given to the same version of the model will output the same image every time.
seed.title: Seed

num_images.description: The number of images to generate.
num_images.title: Num Images

enable_safety_checker.description: If set to true, the safety checker will be enabled.
enable_safety_checker.title: Enable Safety Checker

output_format.description: The format of the generated image.

title: AppInput
